idioms.reading: むすめひとりにむこはちにん

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿は完全に病気から回復した。
lessons.english: His son-in-law completely recovered from his illness.

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿は海外の支店に転勤になった。
lessons.english: His son-in-law was transferred to an overseas branch.

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿がその莫大な財産の相続人になるだろう。
lessons.english: His son-in-law will be the heir to the enormous fortune.

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿がその莫大な財産の相続人になるだろう。
lessons.english: His son-in-law will be the heir to the enormous fortune.

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿は海外の支店に転勤になった。
lessons.english: His son-in-law was transferred to an overseas branch.

lessons.japanese: 彼の娘婿は完全に病気から回復した。
lessons.english: His son-in-law completely recovered from his illness.

lessons.japanese: トムはメアリーの娘婿だよ。

lessons.english: The groom is thirty years old.

lessons.japanese: トムはメアリーの娘婿だよ。

lessons.english: The groom is thirty years old.
